answer:
Tips for locating immunization records are here. Adults can have their childhood immunization records reviewed, and the health care provider can recommend which vaccine(s) are needed to be up-to-date for age. Contact your local health unit. Use the health unit finder.
Immunization Nurse
question: What to do if I can't find my child's full set of immunization records and now I'm wondering if I did them all? My child is 20.
question_variation_0: can child records show immunization records for all vaccines
question_variation_1: when do i find child's immunization records?
question_variation_2: what year is one child in immunization records
